alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Portage (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 8:32PM EDT until July 02 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Western Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Lake County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 831 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cleveland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Willowick, Chardon, Lakewood, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Willoughby, Eastlake, Streetsboro, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Highland Hills, Timberlake, Lakeline, Chesterland, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights and Maple Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
